ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: An overview of the past century of European social theory. Important for engagement in academic debates.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I felt that the selections helped make me proficient in some of the major discussions in anthropology/cultural studies. However, I did feel that these were largely Western centric selections and I'm not sure how often I will return to some of them in my own research. Along those lines, it may be helpful to add texts from non Western authors from across a wider variety of disciplines.
